name: Sven Laur
content: Fools rush where angels fear to tread MTAT » ATI » Sven Laur Cool stuff: PhD Comics   ¤ PhD Blog ¤ BIIT ¤ Sharemind Sven Laur Address: Liivi 2, Tartu 50409, Estonia Office: 326 E-mail: swen@math.ut.ee E-mail policy: I have an explicit white list spam filtering policy. All letters not in the white list will be deleted with probability 99%. To get through the spam into the white list add "Soovin saada kontakti" into the Subject field. After that I'll read the mail and add your address into the white list. Sorry, for inconvenience but this is the best way I know how to handle spam. Springer, 2004. [PDF] [DOI] Supervision A proper way to choose your supervisor and thesis topics The following graph depicts the essence of academic studies. In particular, I am very reluctant do take student, which do not follow this graph, as all other configurations are known to be risky and potentially harmful to all parties involved in this process. Of course, I sometimes make exceptions but only for extraordinary persons.
